website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable sunglasses for women with an interesting design at a great price.
pros: Great price for quality women’s sunglasses
Can see clearly through the lenses, even in low-light conditions
Large lenses protect eyes well from the sunlight
Unusual lens shape can attract compliments
cons: Some customers wish the frames had more vibrant colors

customer_reviews.title: Great for an Asian face
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife who is Asian. She always has some difficulty with a proper nose fit. We went through about six pairs of glasses before settling on these. They are stylish and look great. I love the lifetime guarantee. She was a bit disappointed they weren't polarized, but they look so good, she has looked beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: HeadWound

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: These fit me so well! It's snug, comfortable, and my eye lashes don't touch the lens. The best part is, they do not get caught in my hair. Cons: The colors aren't as vibrant as the picture shows. Bonus: Comes with a case and a cloth for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Charla S.

customer_reviews.title: Solid women's glasses for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mother for mother's day, glasses are awesome for the price, I don't like the way most girls glasses look but these one's stood out to me, I buy lot's of sunglasses. She loves them and I like them and they were a good price, win/win. My aunt bought a pair shortly after from Amazon, our family has two pairs of these now haha.
customer_reviews.author: Spaghettisaurusrex

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these they fit nice and you cant beat the price. Love these glasses might buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: Kellye

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but!
customer_reviews.text: Really love the sunglasses! Difficult to pick out sunglasses online but these fit great. The packaging is awesome! Came in an Electric hard case with cleaning cloth and sticker. Excellent purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine m fregd

customer_reviews.title: Electric California shades
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these in Celestial Blue from a 3rd party seller. They are great glasses, very comfy. The color is beautiful but not a lot like the pic. They are a lilac/periwinkle that gets lighter or darker depending on the light - very tanzaniteesque. Great quality at a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: girasoleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes it, and, it's not made in China, hahaha.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I've loved Electric since I remember, this sades were for a friend and she loved them as well, it is very good how you can get sades from old season with an amazing price. No complains
customer_reviews.author: Erick Acuna

customer_reviews.title: Great color. Black frames purplish gradient
customer_reviews.text: Great color. Black frames purplish gradient. Black frames. Mom loved them for mother's day. Hard case and a cleaning cloth. Electric sticker a cool cut out for shading the electric logo.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sauce!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Spy glasses for years, as they are the only glasses that don't mash my eye lashes - ILOVE THESE GLASSES!!! Color, fit, case, price, the lens itself is super crisp!!! Never again will I buy expensive glasses-
customer_reviews.author: Ang koz

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously love these & the price. Came 2 days early, w/a well made case w/cleaning cloth. Love them! Exactly as pictured & great quality. Would/will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: the frame is NOT red. I was disappointed that the frame was more a brown than red, but after trying on and wearing these glasses, I don't want to take them off. They are really light, have fabulous lenses and fit great!!
customer_reviews.author: ursula ayer

customer_reviews.title: not red
customer_reviews.text: It is not the color it appears in the pic. It is more of a dark burgundy. Disappointed in the color. The shape is nice, but for me the color was key.
customer_reviews.author: MMV

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I thought they may be too big but fits fine. I've received many compliments and may buy other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: these are a good quality pair of sunglasses for the price.. my girl loves them
customer_reviews.author: Joshua H.

customer_reviews.title: My eyes are in heaven
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely! Ahhh, my eyes are in heaven. It is sooo nice to have a quality pair of sunglasses that are gorgeous to boot. An awesome case and polish cloth were included to keep the shades in good condition. Amazing value!
customer_reviews.author: amnesiantoinette

customer_reviews.title: Great enhancement to my outfit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these babies to pair with my Retro bathing suit for my 40th Birthday Vegas pool party! And they were a great enhancement to my outfit!
customer_reviews.author: SheRocks21

customer_reviews.title: Not the color in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell they are red unless you hold them up to a bright light!!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie bkweaver414

customer_reviews.title: More Cranberry than Red...
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are very pretty and fit well, but they are not the vibrant red pictured in the photo. They are more of a cranberry color. It works, but it is not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sweets

customer_reviews.title: perfectly oversized with perfectly angled modern cat eye frames
customer_reviews.text: these are really fun - they are definitely my go-to pool/beach/lake sunglasses as they match my poolside attire!
customer_reviews.author: LoLo

customer_reviews.title: are good, but are smaller than it looks in the ...
customer_reviews.text: are good, but are smaller than it looks in the photos, the logo of the brand is very small and not well appreciated , good is that it includes a rigid protector for sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: omar

customer_reviews.title: Looks a little funny on me
customer_reviews.text: They are just ok. Looks a little funny on me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love them! The fit is great, they are quality glasses. I just ordered my third pair. Can't beat this price!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These glasses ate very well made. I quite pleased. Just know the frames aren't round as they appear in photo. I really wanted round frames.
customer_reviews.author: gale c maynard

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had them for 45 days and the screws just feel out. Since I am out of the 30 day return policy, I am out a pair of sunglasses. Look nice but fall apart fast, I really only wore them maybe ten times...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cpatten

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses, great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I just love them! The fit is perfect since I have a small head and that is always a problem.
customer_reviews.author: EBarranon

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had actually received these but instead I received ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had actually received these but instead I received a totally different pair in the wrong box. Unfortunately I purchased them as a gift and didn't have time to return them.
customer_reviews.author: rachel bates

customer_reviews.title: I love these sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price! Very happy with this purchase. I wasn't familiar with this brand, took a risk that they would fit and they do and I would purchase this brand again. Very nice case and a cleaning cloth, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bellinger

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love them very very much! great sunglasses!!!! Even though I wasn't sure in advance how such style of sunglasses would fit me, but now I'm sure that's really my style!
customer_reviews.author: Tamar

customer_reviews.title: Super stocked glasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my girlfriend as a gift. She loves them. Good quality real electrics not a knock off/ imposter glasses. super fast shipping by seller. Looked better then picture.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Proulx

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: too big and color is not as seen on website
customer_reviews.author: madhavi alagiyawanna

customer_reviews.title: They are cute
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and were a great price, but the plastic is not as nice as the other electric frames I have previously purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Bhim-Rao

customer_reviews.title: Yem
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are better looking in person , straight up dank
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Gilleland

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: If you want glasses that are red DO NOT BUY these. They are nowhere near the color of red that appears in the picture. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Electric Visual Magenta Sunglasses
product_meta.description: Electric Visual is a leading manufacturer of sunglasses, goggles, and accessories in the action sports industry. All of their products are tested through their extensive team in the harshest of conditions. All products are made with the highest quality materials on the market. The brand strives to give you products that make you feel good about yourself, and will last the test of time.
